title: Sappimah Cassava Refinery
description: Complete brand identity development for Sappimah, an agricultural processing company specializing in cassava refinery.
challenge: Developing a brand identity that communicates both agricultural tradition and modern processing techniques while positioning Sappimah as a premium cassava products manufacturer.
solution: We created a brand identity that balances agricultural heritage with modern processing capabilities, featuring earthy color tones complemented by clean, contemporary design elements that appeal to both B2B clients and end consumers.
